title: Is YG Entertainment treating BLACKPINK’s Jisoo unfairly? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly, I don’t think YG has any feelings for Jisoo. To YG, I think Jisoo is kinda just there. They merely think of her as a visual. The outfits they give her aren’t outstanding, but they aren’t terrible. Another reason why I think they merely think of her as a visual, is because in their snogs, she barely gets an outstanding line/part. AIIYL—Jennie and Rosé got the bridge parts D4—Rosé got the bridge part Kill This Love—Rosé got the bridge part, Jennie’s voice was louder than the others at the end DKWTD/Forever Young—Rosé and Jennie get the chorus, and Jisoo’s only chorus part is the ‘you~’ Basically-any-Blackpink-song—Jennie and Rosé take turns doing the chorus, Jisoo would be the ‘backup vocals’ or get to sing 2 words; Lisa sometimes gets the most memorable rap parts; Jisoo… They clearly don’t think of her as anything more or anything less than a visual. They really neglecting talent. Lisa also doesn’t really get much, but we’re talking about Jisoo here.

TBH, yes. She has the least line in any Blackpink songs. When how you like that teaser was out, YG only posts 3 sets of photos. And the members? Well, of course, Jennie, Lisa, and Rose. So that means, she didn’t get any individual picture. She wasn't in any thumbnails of MOST Blackpink's music video. And the reason why I think YG is treating her like this because she “DoN’T fIt In BlAcKpInK.” Other members can speak English fluently, but she can’t. Other members have WeStErN popular names, while her name is Jisoo. Even if I got the reason wrong, he still doesn’t have excuses to treat Jisoo unfairly from the other member!!!! Hope YG learns
